items.name: Bumblebee (2018)
items.description: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town. Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.

items.name: Aquaman (2018)
items.description: Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, and must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.

items.name: A Star Is Born (2018)
items.description: A musician helps a young singer find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

items.name: Perfect Strangers (2017)
items.description: Seven friends gather for dinner and decide to play a game in which all incoming messages and calls will be on display for the entire group, leading to a series of revelations that gradually unravels their 'normal' lives.

items.name: The Mule (2018)
items.description: A 90-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran is caught transporting $3 million worth of cocaine through Illinois for a Mexican drug cartel.

items.name: The Grinch (2018)
items.description: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

items.name: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018)
items.description: The second installment of the Fantastic Beasts series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.

items.name: Green Book (2018)
items.description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.
